data.what_is:
Since 2002, 360 Cloud Solutions has helped hundreds of fast-growing companies leverage NetSuite, Adaptive Insights, and 360 Subscription Billing--our in-house, Built for NetSuite subscription billing management SuiteApp--along with other powerful, cloud-based tools. From licensing to implementation, services and ongoing support, we do it all. We're big believers in the cloud and what it can do for businesses of all sizes and types--whether a startup in growth mode or an established company struggling with on-premise legacy systems.

Ready to hop on the growth bandwagon? We can help.

Services
* Implementation
* Optimization
* Custom Development
*  Integrations
* Support, Admin, Training
* Staff Aug
* Business Process Reviews

NetSuite Expertise
* NetSuite Solution Provider Partner since 2002 and NetSuite-certified consultants
* 5-Star NetSuite Partner with more than 125 years' combined experience
* 400+ NetSuite implementations under our belt--and counting
* One partner for all of your NetSuite needs-licensing through support
* We don't just sell the software-we use it to run and grow our own business, too

Workday Adaptive Planning Expertise
* Our practice director has been a Workday partner since 2006
* Certified consultants with 50 years' combined experience
* 75+ implementations under our belt and 50+ of various FP&A tools
* One partner for all of your FP&A Insights needs, licensing through support
data.product_description: 360 Cloud Solutions focuses on improving businesses performance through the strategic integration of pure cloud-based business software.
data.positioning_against_competitor:
With so many choices out there, why choose 360 Cloud Solutions?

* We Walk the Walk: We don't just sell this software, we use it to run (and grow) our business, too.
* NetSuite Know-how: 360 Cloud Solutions was the third ever NetSuite Partner.
* We Know Our Stuff: Our senior-level team has more than 125 years' combined experience in NetSuite and more than 50 years' in Workday Adaptive Planning.
* Budgeting & Planning Pioneers: Our FP&A practice director was the second ever Workday Partner--a forecast we're proud to have predicted.
* #Winning: With over 400 successful implementations (and counting), we know how to get it done.
* Certified, 5-Star Firm: We're a 5-Star NetSuite Solution Provider with a team certified in development, consulting, administration, and project management.

initial_reviews.review_title: There is not another software that can give you so much with such little ease.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about 360 Cloud Solutions?
That I can easily log in and have my most used tools right there. Easy access to all my work-related files such as pay, medical, 401k, employees and company info.

What do you dislike about 360 Cloud Solutions?
There is nothing to dislike about the system. Easy to navigate through. You are able to search for anything needed or anyone. I Rolodex of information at your fingertips.

Recommendations to others considering 360 Cloud Solutions:
I highly recommend using 360 Solutions for your everyday work needs. The ability to provide easy access to staff and employees without having to wait for HR is amazing and useful.

What problems is 360 Cloud Solutions solving and how is that benefiting you?
360 allows us to see all of our information from work like our PTO, personal info, company info, hours worked, and payroll. So many useful tools located in one simple spot.

initial_reviews.review_title: SuiteScript Deep Dive Training - Map/Reduce and Client Scripts
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task 360 Cloud Solutions helped with:
Developer Training

What do you like best about 360 Cloud Solutions?
Planning around this session was phenomenal. Before the session, I was asked about what I would be interested in learning more about, then received an email requesting any additional things I might want to ask about in the session. This resulted in a well-organized session with a minimum of on-the-fly questions (though these were encouraged and answered well).

What do you dislike about 360 Cloud Solutions?
My 2023 vehicle's GPS sent me to the old 360 office in Morrisville. Was 30 minutes late. I view this as Land Rover's fault rather than a 360 issue, but could be problematic for in-person clients. Regarding the training, I had no complaints. Plenty of opportunities for breaks. Great material I can immediately apply to challenges at the day job.

What problems is 360 Cloud Solutions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Large scale datasets within NetSuite coming across integrations is a major component of in-flight projects. The examples of map/reduce application shown within the training can vastly simplify the project plan.  I also own some processes on scheduled/restarting scripts that take up to 40 minutes. These could also be made more efficient.

initial_reviews.review_title: Matt Dahse accelerated my skills for SuiteScript development. He is an extremely valuable resource!
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task 360 Cloud Solutions helped with:
I attended Matt Dahse's SuiteScript Deep Dive on key NetSuite/SuiteScript topics.

What do you like best about 360 Cloud Solutions?
The material is well organized and presented in an easily digestible manner. There was also room for diving into other relevant topics.

What do you dislike about 360 Cloud Solutions?
I wish I had more time with them to deep dive into every single SuiteScript module.

Recommendations to others considering 360 Cloud Solutions:
Be willing to listen and learn, and have your problems well thought out and defined. There are so many things going on in NetSuite so you should always be willing to learn from those more experienced than you.

What problems is 360 Cloud Solutions solving and how is that benefiting you?
I was learning how to efficiently use SuiteScript. I have realized the benefits of structured workflows, utilizing appropriate modules, and optimizing code.

Describe the project or task 360 Cloud Solutions helped with:
SuiteScript Deep Dive

What do you like best about 360 Cloud Solutions?
The exercises in the individual test accounts were helpful for hands-on learning, and the information was presented in a way such that it was very educational without being overwhelming

What do you dislike about 360 Cloud Solutions?
I would've liked more topics to be covered, but there is only so much you can do in one day

What problems is 360 Cloud Solutions solving and how is that benefiting you?
This Deep Dive course has given me a more in-depth understanding of some of the most important NetSuite script types. I've learned some things that aren't reviewed in Oracle's training videos

Describe the project or task 360 Cloud Solutions helped with:
We have worked with 360 on multiple projects, some smaller some very complext. each time 360 cloud solution team was abel to resolve the issue in time. Anna our customer service representative is always promt and on it.

What do you like best about 360 Cloud Solutions?
Our account repr, Anna Lewis. Always the

What do you dislike about 360 Cloud Solutions?
re for us finding the reght poeple and solution to our problems.

What problems is 360 Cloud Solutions solving and how is that benefiting you?
more streem line processes, customizations, etc.....

Describe the project or task 360 Cloud Solutions helped with:
Full ERP implementation from antiquated system

What do you like best about 360 Cloud Solutions?
The people are friendly and helpful and do what they say they will do on time and in budget.

What do you dislike about 360 Cloud Solutions?
The system is almost too configurable. It seems like there should be a more standard system for use by small business

What problems is 360 Cloud Solutions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Awareness of our financials and utilizing the analytics to drive business outcomes.

initial_reviews.review_title: Intelligent, friendly, competent personnel. This is my experience with 360.
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task 360 Cloud Solutions helped with:
Our software is highly customized. Custom projects are submitted almost daily.

What do you like best about 360 Cloud Solutions?
My main contact at 360 is Anna Lewis. She is a true professional. Her patience, knowledge, and guidance are greatly appreciated.

What do you dislike about 360 Cloud Solutions?
As with any business, personnel shortages are difficult. The development team at 360 is fantastic, but at times they seem overloaded and can be slow.

Recommendations to others considering 360 Cloud Solutions:
They truly live up to their name!

What problems is 360 Cloud Solutions solving and how is that benefiting you?
360 Solutions has helped us completely change the daily business process. Regardless of the level of customization, 360 Solutions has a way to make it work.

initial_reviews.review_title: 360 Cloud's team is very attentive, friendly, and a pleasure to work with.
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task 360 Cloud Solutions helped with:
The 360 Cloud team is very helpful, knowledgeable, and willing to take on any task.

What do you like best about 360 Cloud Solutions?
How the team takes time to provide training and other insight, as well as develop new tools.

What do you dislike about 360 Cloud Solutions?
Nothing to really dislike. They provide helpful service and support.

What problems is 360 Cloud Solutions solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are working on consolidating our Vendor forms down to one or two (as opposed to five). With so many other projects happening, it's helpful to have 360's support to keep projects moving forward.
